name: Asana
short_description:
Asana is a web and mobile application designed to help teams improve
communication, organization and collaboration.
long_description:
Asana is the easiest way for teams to track their work. From tasks and projects
to conversations and dashboards, Asana enables teams to move work from start to
finish--and get results. Available at asana.com and on iOS & Android. It was
founded by [Dustin Moskovitz](/person/dustin-moskovitz), a co-founder of
[Facebook](/company/facebook), and [Justin
Rosenstein](/person/justin-rosenstein), an alum of both Facebook and
[Google](/company/google). Asanaâ€™s mission is to help humanity thrive by
enabling all teams to work together effortlessly.
